content:
DAV Property XML Elements

  • DAV Property XML Elements

    • Prop and its children describe a property’s name and value. The Prop element is used anywhere a property needs to be described, for example, in setting and getting properties.

  • Prop

    • http://www.ietf.org/standards/dav/prop, contains two elements, propname and propvalue.
